title: ‘Won’t join Interim Govt if President & PM remain’ – Opposition Leader
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Opposition Leader Sajith Premadasa on Monday (25) said he is not prepared to be a member of an Interim Government where President Gotabaya Rajapaksa & Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa would continue to remain in those positions.
‘Won’t join Interim Govt if President & PM remain’ – Opposition Leader
Pope Francis & Cardinal attend holy mass to remember those who died in the 2019 Easter Attacks
